titles.title: Teacher Tax Cut Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for elementary and secondary school teachers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E347)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
2/14/2007--Introduced.
Teacher Tax Cut Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a tax credit of $3,000 for full-time elementary and secondary school teachers.
